fields_of_interest: Budget, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Luxinnovation covers all Horizon 2020 programme committees and is the Luxembourg Horizon 2020 National Contact Point. Moreover, Luxinnovation's Head of EU Liaison is following very closely FP9 developments.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit: Luxinnovation is an organisation that contributes to the economic development of Luxembourg by fostering innovation, fuelling international growth and attracting foreign direct investment.
